title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

TUESDAY OCTOBER 8, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 **

It will be difficult to get the balance right between relationships and work responsibilities, as your stress levels rise and patience flies out the window. So ‘slow and steady’ is the motto for today.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 **

It’s not the ideal day to take off on a fun holiday or important business trip, as Saturn slows things down or delays travel plans. If you must make a move, then double-check your itinerary carefully.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 **

When it comes to financial matters today, keep it simple and try not to stress about things that you can’t change. If you are expecting money from someone else, be prepared to wait.

CANCER June 22-July 23 **

Close relationships will be a challenging juggle today, as many demands are placed on you and your energy levels take a dive. Try to relax, and steer clear of situations that produce extra tension.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 **

Cats will feel cranky today! It won’t take much to irritate you, and relations with loved ones or colleagues will be strained. So pace yourself and do all you can to avoid stressful people and situations.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 **

Relations with a child, teenager or friend will be frustrating today, as you encourage them to do something and they drag their heels. Not everyone shares your conscientious can-do attitude!

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

The day will progress well if you are discriminating and disciplined; productive and patient. Resist the temptation to critique others though. Let them run their own race and make their own mistakes.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 **

Expect a rather challenging day, with financial problems or frustrating friendships. But don’t blame others if things aren’t working out. The only person who’s likely to sabotage your efforts is you.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

You’re feeling rather disorganised at the moment. With the Sun, Venus and Mars visiting your hopes and wishes zone, make your dreams for the future as big and beautiful as possible.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 **

With challenging Sun/Saturn aspects, the odds are you’ll be stressing about something. If you try to convert others to your way of thinking, you could end up with a power struggle on your hands.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 **

Restless Aquarius - it will feel like one step forwards and two steps back today, as Saturn stymies your motivation and slows your progress. The lesson to learn at the moment is patience!

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

You’re in the mood to socialise, but that doesn’t mean you’re happy about who you’re fraternising with! If a friend or acquaintance continues playing silly mind games, then perhaps it’s time to move on?

YOUR DAY

The Sun and Saturn are at odds so expect a stop/start kind of day, when nothing much gets done.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Born on the zodiac’s Day of High Romance, you love to be in love. 2020 is the year to turn abstract ideas into actual projects.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
